item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers ski club is welcoming new guests and prospective members to check out its lodge in the Mt. Washington Valley.

Join us for a fun filled weekend of skiing, snowboarding,  and apres ski events. This is a popular weekend in the Mt Washington Valley so sign up quick before we sell out!  It is a great chance to meet and socialize with our members and guests, visit our ski club lodge, and enjoy everythng the Mt Washington Valley has to offer. Optional low cost apres ski events on Saturday afternoon and evening, and an optional catered dinner at the Brettl-Hupfers Ski Lodge.  First and second time guests get $10 guest lodge fees per night (1/2 price).

The lodge is located near Wildcat, Bretton Woods, Cranmore, and Black Mountain. Cannon, Loon and Waterville Valley can all easily be skiied on the drive between greater Boston and our house as well. There is great snowshoeing, cross country skiing, outdoor ice skating and don't forget about the outlet shopping in North Conway!! There is plenty to do to fill a Friday, Saturday and Sunday. Once you RSVP full directions and information will be given. All guests must be 21+. Please note that a "yes" RSVP on meetup does not guarantee a spot at the lodge.  All guests must confirm directly with Krissie to reserve a spot.
item.name: The Next Best Weekend of Your Life
